SageTVPlugin.Name: Scrolling Setup on Main Menu
SageTVPlugin.Description: Adds a scrollbar to the Setup menu. This is meant to be used by developers and has no end user functionality on its own.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.00.20151129 - Moved hosting from Google Code to GitHub. No functionality changes.
1.00.20110115 - First release.
